description: Talk between director Satou Jun`ichi and Taketatsu Ayana (Sawatari Fuu`s VA) with Gibu Yuuko (Sakurada Maon`s VA) as the host.

titles.title: Tamayura Special Interview (Club AT-X Special Edition)
